Introducing SyncIt: The Best Media Sync Extension!

Do you want to watch videos or listen to music with friends?
Don't want to go through the hassle of using Google Meet or Discord to watch?
Do you want controls for each person watching?

SyncIt is made for you. simple, effortless and instant sync, with virtually no limits to how many people can watch at once, all for FREE, yes! try it and see for yourself. 

Amazed yet? if you are leave a review and if you want some more features please write a review on what you want and I will be thrilled to add that in, this extension is made for the express purpose of enjoying media together and any feature that adds to that is absolutely welcome.

Features:

- Watch Together With Friends
- Watch Videos in Sync with everyone having control of the video
- The video is automatically synced across all devices when another video is played, no need to start the sync again
- Watch with as many people as you like
- Very small Latency (almost Instantaneous )
- Control the playback of other tabs playing media from one place
- Beautiful UI
- Easy to use and Straight Forward

Thanks, Kushal Thakur.
More from me on my website: https://kushalthakur.netlify.app/
